columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the virtual machine.

columns.name: power_state
columns.description: Specifies the power state of the vm.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The virtual machine provisioning state.

columns.name: vm_id
columns.description: Specifies an unique ID for VM, which is a 128-bits identifier that is encoded and stored in all Azure IaaS VMs SMBIOS and can be read using platform BIOS commands.

columns.name: size
columns.description: Specifies the size of the virtual machine.

columns.name: admin_user_name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the administrator account.

columns.name: allow_extension_operations
columns.description: Specifies whether extension operations should be allowed on the virtual machine.

columns.name: availability_set_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID of the availability set.

columns.name: billing_profile_max_price
columns.description: Specifies the maximum price you are willing to pay for a Azure Spot VM/VMSS.

columns.name: boot_diagnostics_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether boot diagnostics should be enabled on the Virtual Machine, or not.

columns.name: boot_diagnostics_storage_uri
columns.description: Contains the Uri of the storage account to use for placing the console output and screenshot.

columns.name: computer_name
columns.description: Specifies the host OS name of the virtual machine.

columns.name: disable_password_authentication
columns.description: Specifies whether password authentication should be disabled.

columns.name: enable_automatic_updates
columns.description: Indicates whether automatic updates is enabled for the windows virtual machine.

columns.name: eviction_policy
columns.description: Specifies the eviction policy for the Azure Spot virtual machine and Azure Spot scale set.

columns.name: image_exact_version
columns.description: Specifies in decimal numbers, the version of platform image or marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

columns.name: image_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID of the image to use.

columns.name: image_offer
columns.description: Specifies the offer of the platform image or marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

columns.name: image_publisher
columns.description: Specifies the publisher of the image to use.

columns.name: image_sku
columns.description: Specifies the sku of the image to use.

columns.name: image_version
columns.description: Specifies the version of the platform image or marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

columns.name: managed_disk_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID of the managed disk used by the virtual machine.

columns.name: os_disk_caching
columns.description: Specifies the caching requirements of the operating system disk used by the virtual machine.

columns.name: os_disk_create_option
columns.description: Specifies how the virtual machine should be created.

columns.name: os_disk_name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the operating system disk used by the virtual machine.

columns.name: os_disk_vhd_uri
columns.description: Specifies the virtual hard disk's uri.

columns.name: os_name
columns.description: The Operating System running on the virtual machine.

columns.name: os_version
columns.description: The version of Operating System running on the virtual machine.

columns.name: os_type
columns.description: Specifies the type of the OS that is included in the disk if creating a VM from user-image or a specialized VHD.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: Specifies the priority for the virtual machine.

columns.name: provision_vm_agent
columns.description: Specifies whether virtual machine agent should be provisioned on the virtual machine for linux configuration.

columns.name: provision_vm_agent_windows
columns.description: Specifies whether virtual machine agent should be provisioned on the virtual machine for windows configuration.

columns.name: require_guest_provision_signal
columns.description: Specifies whether the guest provision signal is required to infer provision success of the virtual machine.

columns.name: ultra_ssd_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether managed disks with storage account type UltraSSD_LRS can be added to a virtual machine or virtual machine scale set, or not.

columns.name: time_zone
columns.description: Specifies the time zone of the virtual machine.

columns.name: additional_unattend_content
columns.description: Specifies additional base-64 encoded XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file, which is used by windows setup.

columns.name: data_disks
columns.description: A list of parameters that are used to add a data disk to a virtual machine.

columns.name: linux_configuration_ssh_public_keys
columns.description: A list of ssh key configuration for a Linux OS

columns.name: network_interfaces
columns.description: A list of resource Ids for the network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.

columns.name: patch_settings
columns.description: Specifies settings related to in-guest patching (KBs).

columns.name: private_ips
columns.description: An array of private ip addesses associated with the vm.

columns.name: public_ips
columns.description: An array of public ip addesses associated with the vm.

columns.name: secrets
columns.description: A list of certificates that should be installed onto the virtual machine.

columns.name: statuses
columns.description: Specifies the resource status information.

columns.name: extensions
columns.description: Specifies the details of VM Extensions.

columns.name: extensions_settings
columns.description: Specifies the details of VM Extensions settings map.

columns.name: guest_configuration_assignments
columns.description: Guest configuration assignments for a virtual machine.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the virtual machine, if configured.

columns.name: security_profile
columns.description: Specifies the security related profile settings for the virtual machine.

columns.name: win_rm
columns.description: Specifies the windows remote management listeners. This enables remote windows powershell.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A list of virtual machine zones.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
